name: Sonic Screwdriver
description: Sonic Screwdriver by TGA Subcool Genetics has been dubbed one of the best yielding plants of all time. With genetic parents Orange Cream Soda and Trainwreck, Sonic Screwdriver leans toward the sativa side, offering stimulating effects with bright, complex terpenes of ripening citrus and forest floor. Trainwreck gives this strain a strong, heady onset that hits right between the eyes, but afterwards settles into the body, exhibiting a comfortable energy throughout. This strain is ideal for overcoming lethargy, curbing minor physical pain, and stimulating the appetite.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Euphoric, Giggly, Uplifted, Creative, Stress, Pain, Cramps, Depression, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes
